name: NSDecimalNumberBehaviors
desc: A protocol that declares three methods that control the discretionary aspects of working with decimal numbers.

items.name: func roundingMode() -> NSDecimalNumber.RoundingMode
items.desc: Returns the way that NSDecimalNumber's decimalNumberBy... methods round their return values.

items.name: func scale() -> Int16
items.desc: Returns the number of digits allowed after the decimal separator.

items.name: func exceptionDuringOperation(Selector, error: NSDecimalNumber.CalculationError, leftOperand: NSDecimalNumber, rightOperand: NSDecimalNumber?) -> NSDecimalNumber?
items.desc: Specifies what an NSDecimalNumber object will do when it encounters an error.

items.name: enum NSDecimalNumber.CalculationError
items.desc: Calculation error constants used to describe an error in exceptionDuringOperation(_:error:leftOperand:rightOperand:).
